channel.title: Barrows question?
channel.description: Ok i know I've been here a lot...so i want to thank you guys for helping me create my server!! Anyway, on my server, when you kill a barrows brother, it drops a key. After you kill all of them, you have a lot of keys. Then when the old dude teleports you to the tunnel, you go through any door, using any key at all. So i edited the drops to make the respective npc drop his armor (e.g. ahrim drops ahrim robes.) But when i compiled and ran, no drops showed up, and now if I want to test, I need to go into my character files and edit my barrows kc. So what I'm asking is, how do i get multiple npcs on the hills on their crypt and not have to reset my killcount? Thank you so much! :D

item.title: Barrows question?
item.dc:creator: @billcosby41 billcosby41
item.description:
@billcosby41 wrote:

I cant find barrows.java.

Read full topic

item.title: Barrows question?
item.dc:creator: @imsuperman05 imsuperman05
item.description:
@imsuperman05 wrote:

Just spawn them via spawn-config.cfg, then take out the killcount prob in barrows.java.

Read full topic

item.title: Barrows question?
item.dc:creator: @billcosby41 billcosby41
item.description:
@billcosby41 wrote:

Ok i know I’ve been here a lot…so i want to thank you guys for helping me create my server!! Anyway, on my server, when you kill a barrows brother, it drops a key. After you kill all of them, you have a lot of keys. Then when the old dude teleports you to the tunnel, you go through any door, using any key at all. So i edited the drops to make the respective npc drop his armor (e.g. ahrim drops ahrim robes.) But when i compiled and ran, no drops showed up, and now if I want to test, I need to go into my character files and edit my barrows kc. So what I’m asking is, how do i get multiple npcs on the hills on their crypt and not have to reset my killcount? Thank you so much!
